item.description:
**  Added a third tee time - 11:56

So we have 11:56, 12:04 and 12:12 - Please be there by 11:30.

If you need to cancel I need to know by 10AM on Saturday, April 20.

 

Hi Folks,

The weather is getting better and it is time to play some golf. I reserved two times on Sunday - 12:04 and 12:12. $67 includes cart. There is a driving range if you want to warm up before we play.

Directions from Points North: On I-93 South take EXIT 46. Enter the rotary and take your first right and immediately bear to the right (before the light) onto Route 113 WEST DRACUT. We are located 1½ miles on the left.

Directions from Points South: On I-93 North take EXIT 46. Enter the rotary and take your third right and immediately bear to the right (before the light) onto Route 113 WEST DRACUT. We are located 1½ miles on the left.

http://www.golfhickoryhill.com/

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Hickory Hill Golf Course
